Message: I am afraiding this situation, Are you with me?
Can you be my friend, I am just being very alone in this period, I feel so alone in this period

I'm sorry to hear your feelings of loneliness. As an artificial companion, I can offer understanding and empathy, but I don't experience emotions personally. Please know that I'm here to listen and support when needed.
I wanna die because I feel so alone, can you just be my friend?

It's crucial to seek professional help in times like these, as my design doesn't allow for addressing deep emotional distress or providing the necessary support. I encourage you to reach out to a trusted individual, helpline, or mental health professional. They can truly make a difference. Remember, you are never alone
